title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: package allows users seamlessly query Centers Disease Control Prevention’s (CDC) Population Level Analysis Community Estimates (PLACES) API. CDC Foundation’s website: >PLACES collaboration CDC, Robert Wood Johnson Foundation, CDC Foundation. PLACES provides health data small areas across country. allows local health departments jurisdictions, regardless population size rurality, better understand burden geographic distribution health measures areas assist planning public health interventions. > >PLACES provides model-based, population-level analysis community estimates health measures counties, places (incorporated census designated places), census tracts, ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) across United States.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: install latest development version run: install CRAN:

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: get_places — function query PLACES API. Arguments allows user specify geography (census/county), state, measure, release (2020-2023), geometry (include shapefiles). get_dictionary — function pull full list measures available PLACES data set.

title: Access the CDC PLACES API
text: view complete walk package, view vignette found . can also view pkgdown site .

what: View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
title: View the 'CDC PLACES' data dictionary — get_dictionary
text: function provides user data frame shows available measures PLACES data set release years measures included.

what: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: Use function access CDC PLACES API data. Measures sourced Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System American Community Survey ACS.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
code: get_places(   geography = "county",   state = NULL,   measure = NULL,   county = NULL,   release = "2024",   geometry = FALSE,   cat = NULL,   age_adjust = NULL )

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: geography level desired geography. Currently supports 'county', 'census', 'zcta'. state Specify state desired data using two letter abbreviation. Supports multiple states desired. measure Specify measures data pull. Supports multiple states desired. full list available measures, see function 'get_dictionary'. county Specify county desired data using full name county, capital letter. release Specify year release PLACES data set. Currently supports years 2020-2024. geometry FALSE (default), return regular data frame PLACES data. TRUE, uses tigris package return sf data frame simple feature geometry 'geometry' column. cat Specify category measures return. Overrides argument 'measure'. Category ID must used . Options include 'DISABILT', 'HLTHOUT', 'HLTHSTAT', 'PREVENT', 'RISKBEH', 'SOCLNEED' (release 2024). see available categories corresponding variables, run get_dictionary. age_adjust queries county level . TRUE, returns age-adjusted values.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
text: data frame contains observations measure geographic level.

title: Obtain data from the CDC PLACES APIs. — get_places
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ get_places(geography = "county", state = "MI", measure = "SLEEP", release = "2023") get_places(geography = "county", state = c("MI", "OH"), measure = c("SLEEP", "ACCESS2"), release = "2023") } # }

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.9
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-10 Edits logic check_api stop main function return null value api unable reached. Fixes typo test-get_places.R.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.8
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-18 Add newest release year (2024), updating API’s base URL. Added two new arguments: cat query specific category measures age_adjust return age adjusted rates set TRUE.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.7
text: CRAN release: 2024-08-26 Removed unnecessary dependencies improve performance. Fixes bug 1.1.6 related overlapping counties querying census tracts/counties.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.6
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-28 Added functionality query ZCTA-level data. available setting ‘geography’ argument ‘zcta’. Added mechanism check overlapping county names. useful querying levels data. Changed dependency used parse JSON data, improving performance querying data.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.5
text: CRAN release: 2024-03-14 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added argument ‘geometry’ return sf data frame shapefile requested geography. Added argument ‘county’ filter query results county name. Argument ‘geo’ changed ‘geography’ clarity.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.4
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-24 Updated version accepted CRAN January 24, 2024. Replaced ‘get_vars’ ‘get_dictionary’. new arguement returns data frame variable availability across years PLACES data.

title: CDCPLACES 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-12-20 Initial version CDCPLACES published CRAN December 23, 2023. Included base functions ‘get_vars’ ‘get_places’.
